statements: SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles;
SELECT name, certification FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification = 'NASA';
SELECT id, name FROM astronaut_profiles ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT name, certification, experience FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE experience > 5 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, certification FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, experience FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE experience < 10 AND certification = 'NASA'
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY experience DESC
SELECT id, name, experience FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification IN ('ESA', 'NASA') ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name, experience_years FROM astronaut_profiles;
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, certification_name FROM astronaut_profiles JOIN certifications ON astronaut_profiles.certification = certifications.certification_name;
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT name, certification_authority FROM astronaut_profiles JOIN certifications ON astronaut_profiles.certification = certifications.certification_name ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, certification FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT astronaut_id, name, certification, experience_years FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE astronaut_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name, certification FROM astronaut_profiles WHERE certification LIKE 'Pilot%';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'NASA' ORDER BY certification_name;
SELECT * FROM astronauts;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM astronauts;
SELECT mission_name, start_date, end_date FROM experience;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications;
SELECT id, name, birth_date, biography FROM astronauts;
SELECT * FROM astronauts;
SELECT name, birth_date FROM astronauts WHERE id = 3;
SELECT astronauts.name, certifications.certification_name FROM astronauts JOIN certifications ON astronauts.id = certifications.astronaut_id;
SELECT astronauts.name, experience.mission_name FROM astronauts JOIN experience ON astronauts.id = experience.astronaut_id WHERE experience.start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT astronauts.name, certifications.certification_name, experience.mission_name FROM astronauts JOIN certifications ON astronauts.id = certifications.astronaut_id JOIN experience ON astronauts.id = experience.astronaut_id WHERE astronauts.birth_date <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM astronauts;
SELECT name, age FROM astronauts WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT * FROM certifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT astronaut_id, mission, duration FROM experiences WHERE duration > 100;
SELECT mission_name, duration_days FROM missions WHERE duration_days < 30;
SELECT * FROM astronauts WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT name, age, experience FROM astronauts WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age;

SELECT astronauts.name, COUNT(certifications.certification_name) AS certification_count FROM astronauts LEFT JOIN certifications ON astronauts.id = certifications.astronaut_id GROUP BY astronauts.name;

SELECT astronauts.name, experiences.role, missions.mission_name FROM astronauts JOIN experiences ON astronauts.id = experiences.astronaut_id JOIN missions ON experiences.mission = missions.mission_name;

SELECT certifications.certification_name, astronauts.name, certifications.issue_date, certifications.expiration_date FROM certifications JOIN astronauts ON certifications.astronaut_id = astronauts.id WHERE certifications.expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY certifications.expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Astronauts;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Astronauts ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM Missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_type, certification_date FROM Certifications WHERE certification_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT spacecraft_name, manufacturer FROM Spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_type = 'Shuttle' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM Astronauts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Certifications WHERE certification_type = 'Pilot';
SELECT a.name, c.certification_type, m.mission_name FROM Astronauts a JOIN Certifications c ON a.astronaut_id = c.astronaut_id JOIN Missions m ON a.astronaut_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT spacecraft_name, manufacturer FROM Spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_type = 'Space Station';
SELECT e.organization, a.name, e.start_date, e.end_date FROM Experience e JOIN Astronauts a ON e.astronaut_id = a.astronaut_id WHERE a.nationality = 'USA';
